channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jamaal Roach x Data

item.title: #FanGauge |Tweet Sentiment Tracker
item.description: OK, so this is not the football related content I had in mind BUT this analysis of Donald Trump’s tweets on the Variance Explained blog got me thinking about ways to apply sentiment analysis to tweets. So what is sentiment analysis… Sentiment analysis is the process of computationally identifying and categorizing opinions expressed in a piece of text, especially in order to determine whether the writer’s attitude towards a particular topic, product, etc.

item.title: Local Warming | Visualising Temperature Increase In Barbados
item.description: Barbados is hot! It’s a tropical paradise in the Caribbean it’s always been hot, but these days, thanks to global warming, it is hotter than ever before. Exactly how hot is it? The devil went to hell to escape the heat in Barbados — Unreliable Narrator (@CorinBailey) July 25, 2018 That sums it up perfectly, the question isn’t if Barbados is getting warmer, that’s a definite.
